about_the_game:
Historical Settings

Experience various historical settings and battles that took place during the Great Patriotic War and Cold War. Fight in Stalingrad and Berlin to avenge the fate of your fellow comrades. Counter the West’s influence in Hungary and Afghanistan in the Cold War.

FPS

Experience the battles of the Great Patriotic War and Cold War from the first-person perspective of a Soviet Soldier. The various weapons allow you to choose your own gameplay style. You can snipe your enemies from afar or get close and mow them down with a machine gun.

Choices Matter

The choices that you make can alter the course of history. Will you be competent enough to lead the Soviets to victory in Afghanistan? Will you violently suppress the Hungarian Uprising? Will you join the Coup to restore the Soviet Union to the old ways? All these choices and more will be given to you.

Multiple Endings

There are six different endings that are determined by the choices you make. Some choices are obvious in how they will impact the ending, while others are less clear. So be careful in every decision you make.

content_descriptors.notes: Soviet Soldier's Demo does focus on the Soviet-Afghan War, which involves violence and death.

short_description: Experience history from the perspective of the Red Army in this story-driven FPS game. Make choices that will affect your comrades and the entire world. Fight in historical battles where you put down insurgents, eliminate enemies, and defend the motherland. The fate of the USSR rests in your hands.
